dc_title_s: Official railway map of the state of Vermont
dc_description_s: Relief shown by shading, hachures and spot heights.; Shows steam railroads and electric railroads.; "Manufactured by the National Survey, Chester, Vt."; "Copyright 1924 by Aaron H. Grout, Secretary of State for the State of Vermont."; Includes index to railroads.|107 x 65 centimeters|Scale [1:253,440] 1 inch = 4 miles|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Secretary of State for the State of Vermont (Montpelier,  Vt), 1924
